fullText: This new Broadway adaptation of A Christmas Carol manages to capture both the intimacy of Dickens's original story and the spectacle that modern audiences expect from a big-budget musical.
dtliExcerpt: This new Broadway adaptation of A Christmas Carol manages to capture both the intimacy of Dickens's original story and the spectacle that modern audiences expect from a big-budget musical.
